summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsNARS Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation is a buildable, full-coverage foundation with up to 16 hours of lightweight, natural, fade-resistant wear.
details: DetailsBenefits16-Hour Fade Resistant Wear: 16 hours of fade-resistant wear with medium-to-full, buildable coverage. Transfer-resistant. Sweat-resistant. Resists oxidization so color stays true all day.Full Coverage Without The Weight: Superior blendability for an imperceptible effect that looks natural, like skin, doesn't look or feel cakey, heavy, drying or masking.Full-Powered Radiance: Instantly provides a lasting radiant finish.FeaturesMedium-to-full coverage16-Hour wearNatural, radiant finishTransfer-resistantSweat-resistantFade-resistantNon-dryingNormal, combination and oily skin typesParaben-freeAlcohol-freeOil-freeFragrance-freeDermatologist testedKey IngredientsSkin Optimizing Complex, a blend of raspberry, apple, and watermelon extracts, helps support skin elastic fibers to smooth and improve skin's texture over time for optimal radiance.Item 2523154How To UseFor best results, apply to clean, moisturized skin without primer. Dispense one pump or a pearl-size amount of Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation and warm with fingertips. Always warm liquid foundation in the hand and apply with fingertips, as this creates the most natural-looking finish. Focus on one area at a time and blend well. Start where more coverage is needed (typically in the center of the face) and work out toward the edge of the face. Too much formula accentuates lines and imperfections. Avoid excess application around eyes or contours of the face.IngredientsDimethicone, Water/Aqua/Eau, Phenyl Trimethicone, Glycerin, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Boron Nitride, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Ppg-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Bis-Butyldimethicone Polyglyceryl-3, Butylene Glycol, Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Aluminum Dimyristate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Tocopherol, Stearyl Alcohol, Behenyl Alcohol, Stearic Acid, Behenic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Peg/Ppg-14/7 Dimethyl Ether, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Potassium Hydroxide, Sodium Lactate, Sodium Pca, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Mica, Barium Sulfate, Alumina, Tin Oxide, Polysilicone-2, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, [+/-(May Contain/Peut Contenir): Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891)],Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: For best results, apply to clean, moisturized skin without primer. Dispense one pump or a pearl-size amount of Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation and warm with fingertips. Always warm liquid foundation in the hand and apply with fingertips, as this creates the most natural-looking finish. Focus on one area at a time and blend well. Start where more coverage is needed (typically in the center of the face) and work out toward the edge of the face. Too much formula accentuates lines and imperfections. Avoid excess application around eyes or contours of the face.

reviews.headline: My Tried and True!
reviews.comments: I've been wearing the shade "Velarius" in this foundation & won't wear anything else. The formula is perfect for pictures day or night!

reviews.headline: I lost the product not sure if I left at register
reviews.comments: I have looked everywhere for the purchased product but cannot find it along with the receipt . Five stars for service

reviews.headline: This product was too pale even after being color matched.
reviews.comments: I'm sorry but this product was too heavy and washed me out. I literally had to go the bathroom and wash it off at work. How embarrassing. And I did a color match with one of the sale people.

reviews.headline: Not transfer resistant.
reviews.comments: The best foundation ever. It makes my skin look smooth and natural. The only down is the tranfer onto anything and anyone you cone in contact with. The best foundation. Please do not discontinue and consider a transfer resistant anything. Loveit! I have been using fir 5 years

reviews.headline: Flawless finish
reviews.comments: This is one of the best foundation I have purchased. Love how it apply so smoothly like my real skin so flawless.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: Ive been using this foundation for the past four years. Ive tried all the new trends - ilia, kylie cosmetics, saie, too faced, clinique, MAC, YSL, haus labs, and Chanel. No matter what i alway find myself going back to this foundation. The day this is discontinued will be the day i give up makeup. Couldnt imagine a full glan eithout this!

reviews.headline: the colors not on the bottle
reviews.comments: weird.  the color is not on the product.     only on the box (which nobody saves).  otherwise it would be 4 stars but since such a pain to reorder I'm downgrading.  I need the color to reorder online.  so stupid.

reviews.headline: Orange Skin
reviews.comments: The formula for this foundation just isn't good. When you first buy it, it seems like a perfect match for your skin and then it oxidizes really quickly. The pigmentation is completely off with this one. I used to swear by and live by Nars.

reviews.headline: I would buy this once and not refill
reviews.comments: It is supposed to be long wear and it did last but it started to separate after about 30 minutes, and yes I shook the bottle. I also have very red checks naturally and I thought it would be more full coverage but it really didn't cover them, but this might just be me.

reviews.headline: GORGEOUS foundation
reviews.comments: I have purchased Dior, Lancome, Estee Lauder, etc etc etc and all of them fell short of what I was looking for. The beauty specialist helped me select this Nars foundation and it is PERFECTION. I am thrilled.

reviews.headline: I LOVEEEE THIS
reviews.comments: Ive been using this foundation for three years, and it has NEVER once failed me. The tiktok trends will often influence me to buy a new foundation and try something else, but nothing compares to this foundation. I can't get enough of it. One bottle will last you a long time! I have sensitive, acne - prone, oily skin and i often get eczema on my face. This foundation has never once irritated my skin, or clogged my pores. It feels weightless, and I feel it covers my pores and hyperpigmentation the BEST! I dont know what id do if nars stopped carrying this foundation. I LOVE IT!

reviews.headline: Mixed feelings
reviews.comments: I love NARS and I had used this foundation for a wedding about 3 years ago and loved it. Yet i never repurchased due to rhe expensive price. Well i repurchased it due to having a good memory with using it. Wasn't a fan this time around. It was very patchy and not suitable for dry skin, highlighted my dry patches.

reviews.headline: Good full coverage foundation
reviews.comments: Bought this for a wedding weekend. It is a great full coverage foundation. A little went a long way.

reviews.headline: I'm so disappointed!
reviews.comments: I've been using this products for YEARS! Nars foundation has been absolutely perfect, I always get compliments of how beautiful my makeup looks. But i just purchased a new bottle & I'm so disappointed. The formula definitely changed. It is not the same AT ALL. Its actually so ugly, I'm returning it. I wear Gobi and its always a pretty glow finish, this new bottle was completely orange & dry! The shade is not the same whatsoever. Nothing is the same. So sad, i don't even know what foundation to try next bc i never thought about using a different one. Ugh. Why would they change it!?

reviews.headline: I hate this foundation
reviews.comments: I tried everyting to make this foundation work. I bought it in january and tried for months to try and make it work and I couldnt. I had a pro MUA give me tips and it looked terrible. It was so dry, my skin is very well hydrated and I use a ton of other foundations and this one is the only one that looks bad. Idk if they reformulated recently but its a NO from me.

reviews.headline: Feels good at first
reviews.comments: Feels nice and creamy at first, but then just feels oily and greasy. Transfers to everything no matter what you use to set it. Coverage was oversold; it's at best a light to medium coverage. Longwear isn't accurate at all.

reviews.headline: I would buy this foundation over and over again!
reviews.comments: Works great with my skin.

reviews.headline: Foundation
reviews.comments: I love it, I try other foundations and this is my favorite

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: This is the only foundation I use for my oily t-zones. It's a perfect matte without the worry of too much blotting throughout the day. I'm normally wear for 8+ hours. I only get a shine if I sweat. Hope this help the girlies make a decision. ‚úåÔ∏è

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: First time using it and when I first applied it, it looked so beautiful and I was so excited. After a couple of hours I checked my face and the foundation separated everywhere it looked horrible. I can't believe I was out looking like that. I have combination skin

media.headline: Skin-like Buildable Coverage
media.caption: My neck and chest were actually covered in hives from an allergic reaction (to a food - not the foundation) while taking this picture, and the foundation concealed the hives completely!

faceoff_positive.comments: I finally decided to give the Nars Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation (my shade L4 Light Deauville) a try and I think this is my new favorite foundation I have ever worn! It applies so easily and it is so smooth! In my opinion it does blend better with the beauty blender vs a brush, but both ways blended extremely well I just prefer the beauty blender. This is honestly one of the most light weight foundations I have ever worn, like seriously it didn't even feel like there was anything on my face at all! It did deliver later in the afternoon and I tried it as soon as I got it so I only had about 5 hours of wear time and I was just kind of hanging out doing some chores around the house and took the dogs out for a long walk but through sweat and everything it held up so well! It looks so smooth on the face, it doesn't get cakey at all, even at the end of the 5 hour period! I am interested to see how long it actually does last as it boasts a 16 hour wear, I will be wearing this one to work on Monday so we will see how well she does over an even longer period! Last but not least the coverage was quite lovely, I would say more of a medium coverage but definitely buildable to a full if you desire! Overall an AMAZING foundation that is now number 1 in my collection now! (Side note I am loving this lip in the attached picture also from Nars, it's the Velvet Matte lip pencil in the shade Cruella and then the Afterglow Lip Shine in the shade Broken Glass over-top, so hot!) You will 100% not regret this purchase!!
faceoff_positive.headline: MY NEW FAVORITE FOUNDATION!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: Decent coverage. Def dewier than I expected and def not long wearing. And transfers so easily.
faceoff_negative.headline: NOT long wearing
